text: Invasion of Privacy is the debut studio album by the American rapper Cardi B. It was released on April 5, 2018, by Atlantic Records. Five singles have been released from the album: "Bodak Yellow", "Bartier Cardi"," Be Careful","I Like It" and "Ring". Two of the Singles(Bodak Yellow and I Like It) reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100. == Track listing == Category:2018 albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Debut albums Category:Cardi B
title: Invasion of Privacy (album)
